title: Drawing, January 1869
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite: yel[low] glow; glow

Verso: Inscribed in graphite with figures at various locations and also: blue;  rich broad orange / light; shadow; and again at bottom: 2 soft blurred open sky greenish gold / 3 rich velvety puple brown / landscape near horizon laky purple.
description:
Recto: Horizontal distant view of St. Peter's Basilica from the North, showing the church rising at right against the background of a hill ridge.
Verso: Horizontal study of sky with clouds probably a continuation of the representation of the Rome skyline seen on the reverse of 1917-4-154.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, January 1869.
January 1869. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-155.
